description: The 1 Click WordPress Migration Plugin – 100% FREE for a limited time plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 2.1 via the class-ocm-backup.php. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including usernames and their respective password hashes during a short window of time in which the backup is in process.

product.name: 1 Click WordPress Migration Plugin – 100% FREE for a limited time
